Class Individu

  • java.lang.Object
    • Individu

  • public class Individu
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for creating an 'Individu'. It basically is a Genotype with a given size.
    Author:
    Jerome PIVERT, Raphael CHARLES

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Individu()
      Create new Individu with default values (randomly, gauss distrib genotype) with a size of 5 genes and a void phenotype
      Individu(Individu ind)
      Create a new Individu from a given one (copy constructor)
      Individu(int nbGenes)
      Create new Individu with a randomly, normally distributed values with a given size and a void phenotype
      Individu(int nbGenes, double initialPhenValue)
      Create new Individu with a given size and a default value for phenotype, random genotype
      Individu(Jama.Matrix mat)
      Create new Individu with a given matrix
      Individu(Jama.Matrix genMat, Jama.Matrix phenMat)
      Create new Individu with a given matrix for genotype and phenotype

      • isViable

        public boolean isViable()
        Returns:
